2026-02-02.warmup: 250m row + 250m bike, easy pace. 3 rounds: 10 air squats, 10 walking lunges, 10 KB swings (20kg). 2 rounds: 5 back squats empty bar, 5 good mornings empty bar

exercises.name: Back Squat
exercises.notes: Full depth, controlled descent, explosive out of the hole. Rest 2-3 min

finisher.name: 12-min AMRAP
finisher.details: 10 KB swings (24kg) + 10 box jumps (20-24") + 10 DB thrusters (2x16-20kg)

finisher.name: 10-min EMOM
finisher.details: Min 1: 6 power cleans (40-50kg). Min 2: 10 KB swings (24kg). Repeat.

finisher.name: 10-min EMOM

exercises.notes: Example: 60x5, 80x3, 100x2, 115x1, 125x1 (test). Don't go to absolute failure, leave 1-2 reps in reserve. Rest 2-3 min between attempts
